data.description: Covers electricity licensing (IUJPTL) and technical equipment certification under national standards (SNI). Required before construction and commissioning.
data.functional_role: legal project classification and safety assurance

notes.informal_notes: IUJPTL is often issued provisionally while waiting on grid or AMDAL clearance. SNI testing is a hidden bottleneck with long queue times.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: IUJPTL serves as the formal recognition of a project’s role in the energy sector — often a key milestone for funders and PLN engagement.
notes.feedback_structure: No structured feedback from SNI labs — rejection leads to retest without formal clarification. MEMR has clearer channels.
failure_modes: Delayed issuance of IUJPTL due to minor documentation issues
Disagreement on whether BESS qualifies as generation or support service
